name: photographically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to, is used for, or is produced by photography: Much Italian art has already been photographically documented by commercial firms. The telescope at this observatory is used to survey the sky photographically. See
photographic
More examplesFewer examplesThe pages are photographically reproduced from typewritten manuscripts.No material published in this journal may be reproduced photographically or stored on microfilm.I've tried to express myself photographically, rather than by writing.
